plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I give you shade, but have no seat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall!
🍃 Birds like to build nests in me.
☀️ I protect you from the sun.

plant.question: I'm green and grow in the ground. Rabbits love to eat me, what am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a leafy vegetable.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.
🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I can be put in a vase.
🌻 There are many different types of me!
🎁 People give me as gifts.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves and sometimes fruit. I can grow very tall or stay small. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I need water and sunlight to grow.
🍅 You can grow food on me!
🏡 You can plant me in your garden.

plant.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys like to peel me before they eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love me.
💛 I am yellow when I'm ripe.
🍌 You can slip on my peel.

plant.question: I have sharp needles, but I'm not for sewing. I stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a kind of tree.
⭐ People decorate me at Christmas.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I grow underground and have layers. People cry when they cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am a vegetable.
😭 I can make you cry.
🍔 People put me on burgers.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I taste good with butter!
🌾 I come from a tall plant with kernels.
🎬 You eat me in the cinema.

plant.question: I am a plant that lives in water and has big, round leaves that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs like to sit on me.
💧 I float on ponds.
🍃 My leaves are very large and round.

plant.question: I'm a vine with prickly thorns, producing a red sweet treat in summer homes. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 I grow on a vine!
🌹 My plant is known for its sharp thorns.
☀️ People often grow me in their gardens for a sweet fruit.

food.question: I am yellow and long, and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I am a fruit that grows in bunches.
💛 My peel is bright and cheerful.
🐒 I am a favorite snack of a certain primate.

food.question: I am small, round, and red. I grow on a vine and taste sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a popular snack at picnics.
🌱 I grow in gardens and farms.
💧 Some people like to squish me!

food.question: I am white and fluffy. I come from a hen and need to be cracked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 Some people eat me for breakfast.
🐥 I can be scrambled, fried, or boiled.
🐔 I am laid by a certain bird.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny's favorite food.
👁️ Eating me can help you see better!

food.question: I am made of grains and often eaten with soup or sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be toasted.
🌾 I am often sliced.
🥪 I can hold different types of fillings

food.question: I am cold and sweet, and come in many flavors. People scream for me on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I can be served in a cone or a cup.
🌈 You can put sprinkles on top of me.
🥄 I am often eaten with a spoon.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and juicy green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am small and brown on the outside.
🇨🇳 I am originally from China.
✂ You need to peel me before eating.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green and have many small florets.
💪 Eating me can make you strong.
🍲 I can be steamed, roasted, or eaten raw.

food.question: I am made from milk, but I am solid. I can be cheddar, mozzarella, or Swiss. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I am often eaten with crackers.
🍕 I melt easily, so I am great on pizza.
🐭 Mice are fond of me!

food.question: I am a savory dish, often made with ground meat, tomato sauce, and layers of pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am an Italian favorite.
🍝 I have layers of pasta, sauce, and cheese.
🍽️ I am baked in the oven.
